name: The Fog (Beta)
description:
This is my first 3D game I didn't spend any time on UI i just need people to tell me what needs tweaking and what to change. Any opinions gladly accepted and thank you if you download this game. Some music made by third party companies

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ep4cC0dpOEM by FaceImplosion

All other music made by me.
